text: I am fascinated with the field of computer technology, striving to become a significant contributor to the progress of technology. Graduated with a Bachelorâ€™s in Computer Engineering from the University of Alberta.

Throughout my life I have been able to build a relationship with nature and technology which evolved into aspirations to achieve a career in creating technological solutions for optimizing my life process and preserving the environment.

With a strong desire to develop solutions that enhance our interactions with the environment and improve our relationship with technology, I am currently looking for a full-time position as a software engineer, firmware engineer, or embedded systems engineer.
